00021 import VetPet.*;
00022 import VetPet.Menu.*;

00024 public class AddDog extends MenuCommand
00025 {
00026         public AddDog()
00027         {
00028                 super("Add Dog");
00029         }
00030 
00031      
00032    public boolean executeImpl(Console input) throws Exception
00033         {
00034             VetPetSystem sys = VetPetSystem.getSystem();
00035             String name = input.nextLine("Enter vet name: ");
00036             VetClinic vet = sys.getManager().getVetClinic(name);
00037             
00038             String ID = input.nextLine("Enter ID: ");
00039             String dname = input.nextLine("Enter Name: ");
00040             String type = input.nextLine("Enter Type: ");
00041             String K9_family = input.nextLine("Enter K9_family: ");
00042 
00043             if( vet.addDog(dname,ID,K9_family,type) == false )
00044                 throw new Exception("inncorrect ID number");
00045 
00046 
00047             System.out.println("The dog has been added to the system\n");
00048              
00049             return true;
00050         }
00051 }
